name: While you're here
description:
You wake up in a strange place and can't remember anything about who you are and how you got here. Can you reconstruct the sequence of events and get out of here? We'll see.

[ This game was made for Ludum Dare 45 at Jam Mode. We’re the team of two people, we used: Unity3d, Blender, Photoshop ]

Control: 
WSAD - Walk
LMB - Use interactible object
RMB - Back to exploration
R - Restart (any time)
Alt+F4 - Exit game

Thanks for your feedback! Enjoy.
